description: A discrete approximation to log(n): Sum_{ d divides n } A029833(d).
comments: For n >= 1, log(n) = Sum_{ d divides n } Lambda(d), where Lambda is the real Mangoldt function (see A029833).
references: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, 1976, page 32, Cf. Theorem 2.10.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 08 2000
